Class Water

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiles.Water
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connectable, Tile, WaterTile

    public class Water
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tile, Connectable, WaterTile
    Author:
    Jelmer Firet a water tile sheep can be pushed into water players can walk over water connects to neighbouring water tiles (Water, BoulderWater, PlayerWater, Void)
